subject: Junit result files
msgSnippet: Hi Junit users, I am trying to integrate junit to our own proprietary test framework. Would like to know if Junit result files(xml files) are written/copied
messageBody:
Hi Junit users,

I am trying to integrate junit to our own proprietary test framework.

Would like to know if Junit result files(xml files) are written/copied into any folders in a windows machine, where I run my eclipse.

This would definetly help my task.

Thanks a lot in advacne.

Regards,
Dinesh
